282070.「あたしは 改造屋だよ！\n 塔の中で手に入る 素材をもってきてくれたら\n あ:
I am a remodeler! I can remodel your equipment if you bring me materials that you can find in the tower. Remodeling can add alchemy effects
to your equipment, evolve it into other equipment of the same type, or even convert it into something else. You will lose the
materials you use for remodeling, so please choose carefully. Well then...

282071.「私は 強化屋だよ。\n お持ちの装備を同じ種類の 少し強い装備に\n 強化する:
I am an enhancer. I can strengthen your equipment to a slightly stronger version of the same type. But I can only strengthen your
equipment once each time we meet. So think carefully before you choose. Well then...

282072.「ここは 改造屋だよ。\n あたしに 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_s:
This is the Remodeling Shop. What can I do
for you?
<select_se_off>
Modify Weapon/Shield
Modify Armor
Modify Accessories
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

282073.「他に 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_se_off>\n武器か盾を改造:
Anything else I can do for you?
<select_se_off>
Modify Weapon/Shield
Modify Armor
Modify Accessories
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

282074.「あら？ 装備品を 持っていないみたいね。\n 装備品を 手に入れたら また来て:
What? You don't seem to have any equipment.
Come back when you get some.<end>

282075.「何について 聞きたいのかな？\n<select_se_off>\n改造屋って？:
What do you want to ask me?
<select_se_off>
Remodeling?
Alchemy Slots
Slot Types
Evolve/Convert
<select_end>
<break>

282076.「付けられる 錬金効果には\n 装備しているあいだ 追加のスキルを\n 覚えるこ:
Some alchemy effects can learn additional skills while equipped. The number of slots is limited, but some alchemy effects allow you to
learn several skills at the same time. You can check which skills you can learn when you equip an alchemy effect, so try to find the
one that suits you best.

282077.「スキル以外の 錬金効果は\n スロットごとに 決まった種類の中から\n 好きな:
You can choose any type of alchemy effect you like for each slot, except for skills. However, the strength of the alchemy effect
varies widely, and you cannot know the strength of the alchemy effect until you choose it. You can check the list of possible
strengths when you select an effect.

282078.「武器や防具を より高い装備ランクの\n 別の武器や防具に 作りかえることを\n:
When a weapon or armor is converted into another weapon or armor of a higher equipment rank, it is called evolution. To replace a
weapon or armor with another weapon or armor of the same equipment rank as the original is called conversion. Both Evolution and
Conversion can only be used to make weapons and armor of the same lineage, like the sword from the sword. Note that some alchemy effects
cannot be inherited if the type or number of alchemy effect slots are changed by evolution or conversion.

282079.「素材とゴールドをつかって 持っている装備品を\n 同じ装備ランクの 別の装備に:
You can also use materials and gold to convert your equipment into other equipment of the same rank. However, the type of equipment must
be the same, and you cannot convert a different type of equipment, such as a greatsword from a shield. Also note that some
of the alchemy effects will not be transferred if the slot is changed.

282082.「改造する ベース装備を選択しろ。\n<break>: Select the base equipment to modify.<break>

282083.「ちょっと！ この装備品は\n ロックされているみたいだよ。\n 解除するか 別:
Wait! This piece of equipment appears to be
locked. Either unlock it, or select another
piece of equipment.<end>

282084.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n これ以:
Huh? <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> can't be
enhanced any further. You'll have to choose
another piece of equipment.<end>

282085.「この アイテムはあたしには\n 改造できないよ。\n<break>: I don't think I can modify this item.<break>

282086.「<%sL_SENTAKU_ITEM>だな。\n どのメニューにするんだ？\n<:
<%sL_SENTAKU_ITEM>? Which menu do you want?
<select_se_off>
Granting skills (sets)
Granting alchemy
Evolve equipment
Transform equipment
<select_end>
<break>

282088.「あら？ お金が足りないみたい。\n ゴールドを準備してから また来てね。\n<:
Huh? You're short on money. Come back when
you get more Gold.<end>

282089.「あら？ 素材が足りないみたい。\n 素材を準備してから また来てね。\n<en:
Huh? You're short on materials. Come back
when you get more.<end>

282091.「この効果を セットするけど\n 本当に いいかな？\n<yesno_2><br:
I'll set this effect. Are you sure
you want to do this?<yesno_2><break>

282092.「わかったわ。\n そこで 少し待っててちょうだい……。\n ふんふんふふん！！:
Got it. Just give me one second...
Mmm-hmm-hmmmmm!<se Joutyu_SE 40>
<break>

282096.「そうそう 今回は 特別うまくできたから\n ゴールドは 無料にしておいたよ！\:
Oh yeah! I did super well this time! The
Gold cost is on me!
<end>

282097.「どうも ありがとう！\n また来てくれたら うれしいな。\n<end>:
Thank you very much! I'd be happy to see
you again.<end>

282098.「やめとくの？\n 気が変わったら また話しかけてね。\n<end>:
Don't want to? Feel free to come back if
you change your mind.<end>

282099.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n 今 装:
Oh? It looks like <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> is what you're currently equipped with, but are you sure you
want to convert this?

282100.「<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>から\n <%sL_M:
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> into
<%sL_MORAU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum2>? After
being converted, it'll look like this.<end>

282101.「本当に 作り変えて いいかな？\n<yesno_2><break>:
You want me to evolve this?
<yesno_2><break>

282102.「錬金スロットは そのまま継承するぞ。\n<break>:
The alchemy slot will be inherited.
<break>

282103.「この装備は 錬金スロットの形が違うから\n そのまま 錬金効果の継承は できな:
This equipment has a different alchemy slot, so you cannot inherit the alchemy effect as it is. Please choose the effect you want to
transfer.

282104.「継承できない 錬金スロットがまだあるな。\n もうひとつあるな 移したいモノを:
You still have an alchemy slot you can't
inherit. There's one more thing. Choose the
one you want to transfer.
<break>

285721.「塔の中の装備品には いろんな種類の\n 『錬金効果枠』が ついてるの。\n<b:
There are various types of "alchemy effect slots" attached to the equipment in the tower. Each piece of equipment has a specific number
of alchemy effect slots, and the same piece of equipment has the same number and type of alchemy effect slots. For example, Warrior's
Sword has the same number of alchemy effect slots as any other Warrior's Sword, but Warrior's Sword and Cautery Sword have
different types of alchemy effect slots. The higher the level, the stronger the alchemy effect.

285722.「あら？ スキルをつけられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品を:
Oh? It looks like you don't have any equipment
to put your skills on. Please come back when
you have received the equipment!
<bw_break>

285723.「あら？ 錬金効果をつけられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品:
Oops? I see you don't have any equipment that
can apply the alchemy effect. Please come back
when you have received the equipment!
<bw_break>

285724.「あら？ 進化や変換ができる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品を:
Oops? It looks like you don't have any equipment that can be evolved or converted. Please come back when you have received the
equipment!

285725.「あら？ この装備は 進化や変換をすることが\n できないみたい。\n 別の装備:
Oops? It seems that this equipment cannot be
evolved or converted. Please choose a
different one.
<end>

285726.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n スキ:
Oops? It seems that
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> cannot be
skilled. Please choose another equipment.
<end>

285727.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n 錬金:
Oops? It seems that <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> cannot have an alchemy effects. You have to choose another
equipment.

285728.「選んだ場所に 新しく スキルをつけたり\n 今のスキルを 上書きしちゃうよ。\:
You can add a new skill or overwrite an
existing skill at the location of your choice.
Where will you set them?
<break>

285729.「選んだ場所に 新しく 錬金効果をつけたり\n 今の錬金効果を 上書きしちゃうよ:
You can add a new alchemy effect to the
selected location, or overwrite the current
alchemy effect. Where do I set it?<break>

285730.「あら？ そのスキルは\n もう セットされてるみたいだよ。\n<end>:
What? It looks like your skills are already
set.<end>

285731.「この効果を セットするけど\n 本当に いいかな？\n<yesno2><clo:
I'm going to set this effect. Are you sure
you want to do this?<yesno2><close>

285732.「本当に 変換しても いいかな？\n<yesno2><close>:
You'd like me to convert this?
<yesno2><close>

285733.「上手く 進化できたよ！\n 進化した装備は 今よりも良い錬金効果を\n つけ直:
I've successfully evolved my equipment! You can check the evolved equipment to see if it has a better alchemy effect than the current
one!

285734.「上手く 変換できたよ！\n 付けられる錬金効果が 変わっているから\n 確認し:
I was able to convert it successfully! The
alchemy effect is changed, so please check it!
<bw_break>

285735.「この装備は 錬金スロットの形が違うから\n そのまま 錬金効果の継承は できな:
This equipment has a different alchemy slot, so you cannot inherit the alchemy effect as it is. Please choose the effect you want to
transfer.

285736.「まだ 未選択のスロットが あるみたいだよ。\n 全てのスロットで 継承する効果:
It seems there are still some slots left
unselected. You have to choose the effect you
want to inherit in all slots.
<end>

286109.「ここは 改造屋だよ。\n あたしに 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_s:
This is the Remodeling Shop. What can I do

<select_se_off>
Add Skills

<select_se_off>
Add Skills

Evolve/Convert

<select_end>

286719.「あら？ そこはスキル専用のスロットだから\n 錬金効果は つけられないみたい。:
Oh? That slot is for skills only, so you can't
apply the alchemy effects there. You'll have
to choose another place.
<br_break>

286720.「あら？ そこは錬金効果専用のスロットだから\n スキルは つけられないみたい。:
Oh? That slot is for alchemy effects only, so
you can't apply skills there. Please choose
another slot.
<br_break>

287407.「スキルをセットするんだね。\n どの装備に つけたいのかな？ \n<end>:
You set the skill. Which equipment do you want

<end>

287408.「錬金効果をセットするんだね。\n どの装備に つけたいのかな？ \n<end>:
You set the alchemy effect. Which equipment do
you want to put it on?
<end>

287409.「進化や変換をしたい 装備を選んでね。\n<end>:

convert.

287410.「どんな効果を 付けたいの？\n<end>:
What effect do you want to add?
<end>

287475.「錬金効果が セットできたよ！\n 気に入ってくれると うれしいな！: alchemy effect is ready! I hope you like it!

This is the Remodeling Shop. What can I do

<select_se_off>

287644.「錬金効果をセットするんだね。\n どの装備に 付けたいのかな？ \n<end>:
You set the alchemy effect. Which equipment do

Is there any other equipment that you would

287646.「あら？ 錬金効果を付けられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品:
Oops? I see you don't have any equipment that
can add the alchemy effect. Please come back
when you have received the equipment!
<bw_break>

287647.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n 錬金:
Oops? It seems that <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> cannot have an alchemy effect. You have to choose another
equipment.

287648.「錬金効果を付けたい 場所を選んでね。\n 一度 効果を付けても 素材があれば\:
Choose which slot to apply the alchemy effect.
You can use the same effect multiple times so
long as you have the needed materials.
<break>

287651.「<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>から\n <%sL_M:
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> to
<%sL_MORAU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum2>? When it
evolves, it will look like this.
<end>

287652.「本当に 進化させて いいかな？\n<yesno2><close>:
Can we really evolve this thing?
<yesno2><close>

288282.「持っている装備品に 錬金効果をつけたり\n 新しい別の武器や防具に 進化させた:
You can add alchemy effects to your equipment, evolve it into new weapons and armor, and convert it into other types of equipment! You
will need materials and gold to convert your equipment. You can find a list of all the materials you need in the Tower Tome.

288283.「錬金効果枠の 種類について説明するね。\n まず 黄色いマルは スキルを使える:
Let me explain the types of alchemy effect slots. First of all, the yellow cells give you a special alchemy effect that allows you to
use your skills! However, if you remove the equipment, you will not be able to use the skill, so please be careful. Next, the red
ribbon is an effect to increase power, HP, etc. The orange triangle is an effect to increase damage and skill. The orange triangle
increases damage and skill power. The green diamonds are for attribute power and attribute resistance. Blue squares are effects that
occur during attacks and actions. Armor will have resistance to abnormalities. Lastly, the purple pentagon is an alchemy effect that is
only available in the Accessory section, and can grant special alchemy effects. There are differences depending on the type of weapon or
armor, so try them out!

288803.「やったね！\n 一番いい錬金効果が セットできたよ！: You did it! I've set the best alchemy effect!
